about_the_game:
Frostflame is a Brazilian Souls like developed by just one person.

The game features third-person combat mechanics based on an action RPG system, where you have the possibility of facing enemies in rhythmic combat inspired by Feudal Japan, collecting their flame sparkles to become stronger by upgrading your character and preparing to face even greater challenges.

Explore the village of Kakure and face great challenges ranging from the frozen, corrupted by the flame to the great Shokushu soldiers who dominate the icy flame like no one else.

Meet the characters who can tell you a little more about the events of the lowlands, collect more powerful armor and weapons, explore the depths of the mines and the castle in the large square. Make way for the lowlands.

About the game's lore:
Frostflame will take place in the lowlands, a fantasy location, inspired by Feudal Japan, during a time of war between the five kingdoms of the lowlands, namely: the Golden Hills, the Land of Rain, the Water Gate, the Central Desert and , lastly Borda.
Just like in real life, war occurs due to the search for power and control, but amidst the chaos, a clan called the Shokushu emerges and has been gaining strength using the mysterious power of the Frozen Flame, which gives power and immortality to the Shokushu soldiers, in addition to dominating and controlling those who survive the clan's attacks, transforming them into “frozen”, insane, aggressive and immortal creatures.
In the game you will control Chihiro, disciple of the great Master Hori Masashi. Chihiro lives in the village of Kakure, a place founded by the great Master to shelter those who abandoned the terror of the Lowland wars.
Unfortunately, the village is found, attacked by the Flame clan and Chihiro ends up being captured and taken to some mysterious place. The Shokushu dominate the lowlands and the world descends into chaos and Flame.
Ten years after her disappearance, Chihiro returns as a frozen creature. Master Hori is now an elder who has spent all this time studying the flame and, upon seeing his disciple return, he sends her to open the way to the lowlands, restore peace and eliminate the power of the Frostlame once and for all.
